sen.j: 城陽市（じょうようし）は、京都府に属する市で、京都市と奈良市のほぼ中間に位置する。
sen.e: Joyo City is a city in Kyoto Prefecture and is located in about the middle between Kyoto City and Nara City.
Joyo City is a city in Kyoto Prefecture and is roughly located in the middle between Kyoto City and Nara City.
Joyo City is a city in Kyoto Prefecture and is roughly located in the middle between Kyoto City and Nara City.

sen.j: 正道官衙遺跡（国の史跡）や久世神社、水度神社（いずれも本殿は国の重要文化財）などの歴史的建築物を多数擁するほか、京都サンガF.C.の練習場であるサンガタウン城陽が置かれている。
sen.e: The city has a wealth of historic buildings such as Shodo-kanga-iseki Ruins (ruins designated as a national historical relic site), the Kuse-jinja Shrine (its main shrine being designated as Important Cultural Property) and the Mito-jinja Shrine (its main shrine also being designated as Important Cultural Property), as well as Sanga Town Joyo, a training ground for Kyoto Sanga F.C.

The city has a wealth of historic buildings such as the Shodo-kanga-iseki Ruins (ruins designated as a national historical relic site), the Kuse-jinja Shrine (its main shrine being designated as Important Cultural Property) and the Mito-jinja Shrine (its main shrine also being designated as Important Cultural Property), as well as Sanga Town Joyo, a training ground for Kyoto Sanga F.C.

The city has a wealth of historic buildings such as the Shodo-kanga-iseki Ruins (ruins designated as a national historical relic site), the Kuse-jinja Shrine (its main shrine being designated as Important Cultural Property) and the Mito-jinja Shrine (its main shrine also being designated as Important Cultural Property), as well as Sanga Town Joyo, a training ground for Kyoto Sanga F.C.

sen.j: 金銀糸の生産高では、日本国内の約60％を占めるとされている。
sen.e: Joyo City is believed to produce 60 percent of purl in Japan.
Joyo City is believed to produce 60 percent of the purl in Japan.
Joyo City is believed to produce sixty percent of the purl in Japan.
sen.cmt: 数字をスペルアウトしました。

sen.j: 気候は比較的温暖である。
sen.e: The city has a relatively warm climate.
The city has a relatively warm climate.
The city has a relatively warm climate.

sen.j: 地理
sen.e: Geography
Geography
Geography

sen.j: 城陽市は、京都市の南方、京都府南部の山城地区に属する。
sen.e: Joyo City belongs to the Yamashiro area to the south of Kyoto City and in the south of Kyoto Prefecture.
Joyo City belongs to the southern portion of Kyoto City and the Yamashiro area, located in the southern region of Kyoto Prefecture.
Joyo City belongs to the southern portion of Kyoto City and the Yamashiro area, located in the southern region of Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 京都市と奈良市を結ぶ国道24号が南北に横断し、両市のほぼ中間にある。
sen.e: The National Highway 24, connecting Kyoto City and Nara City, runs north-south, and Joyo City is located in about the middle of the two cities.
The National Highway 24, connecting Kyoto City and Nara City, runs north-south; Joyo City is located between the two cities.
The National Route 24, connecting Kyoto City and Nara City, runs north-south; Joyo City is located between the two cities.
sen.cmt: 国道→national route としました。

sen.j: この他、JR奈良線と近鉄京都線が南北に横断している。
sen.e: Additionally, the JR Nara Line and the Kintetsu Kyoto Line run north-south.
Additionally, the JR Nara Line and the Kintetsu Kyoto Line run north-south.
Additionally, the JR Nara Line and the Kintetsu Kyoto Line run north-south.

sen.j: 木津川 (京都府)の右岸に位置し、市南部を東西に青谷川が流れる。
sen.e: The city is situated on the right side of Kizu-gawa River, and the Aodani-gawa River flows east-west in the southern part of the city.
The city is situated on the right side of Kizu-gawa River, while the Aodani-gawa River flows east-west in the southern part of the city.
The city is situated on the right side of the Kizu-gawa River (Kyoto Prefecture), while the Aodani-gawa River flows east-west in the southern part of the city.
sen.cmt: 京都府 を追加しました。"Kizu-gawa River"→"the Kizu-gawa River"に変更しました。

sen.j: 地勢は西部（大久保バイパス近辺）は概ね平坦で、東部に向かうにつれて起伏の多い地形になっている。
sen.e: In the geographical features of Joyo City, the land on the western part (area around the Okubo Bypass) of the city is flat overall while the land is undulating more and more towards the eastern side.
Geographically, the land on the western part (area around the Okubo Bypass) of Joyo City is flat overall while the land contains more ups and downs further east.
Geographically, the land on the western part (area around the Okubo Bypass) of Joyo City is flat overall while the land contains more ups and downs further east.

sen.j: 歴史
sen.e: History
History
History

sen.j: 1951年（昭和26年）4月1日、久世郡久津川村、寺田村、富野荘村、綴喜郡青谷村の4村が合併して、久世郡城陽町が誕生する。
sen.e: On April 1, 1951, four villages of Kutsukawa-mura in Kuse-gun, Terada-mura, Tonosho-mura and Aotani-mura in Tsuzuki-gun were merged to form Joyo-cho in Kuse-gun.
On April 1, 1951, four villages of Kutsukawa-mura in Kuse-gun, Terada-mura, Tonosho-mura and Aotani-mura in Tsuzuki-gun were merged to form Joyo-cho in Kuse-gun.
April 1, 1951: Four villages of Kutsukawa-mur, Terada-mura, Tonosho-mura in Kuse-gun and Aotani-mura in Tsuzuki-gun were merged to form Joyo-cho in Kuse-gun.
sen.cmt: 久津川村、寺田村、富野荘村は久世郡に属していたようですので、そのように変更しました。"On April 1, 1951, four"→"April 1, 1951: Four"に変更しました。

sen.j: 1972年（昭和47年）5月3日、市制施行。
sen.e: On May 3, 1972, the shisei (grant of city status) was implemented.
On May 3, 1972, the shisei (grant of city status) was implemented.
May 3, 1972: The shisei (grant of city status) was implemented.
sen.cmt: "On May 3, 1972, the"→"On May 3, 1972, The"に変更しました。

sen.j: 市名は、城陽町設置の際に公募。
sen.e: The name of the city was sought from the public when Joyo-cho was established.
The public was consulted when the city was being named.
The public was consulted when the city was being named.

sen.j: 「山城国南部、陽の当たる豊かな土地」という意味。
sen.e: The word "Joyo" means 'a rich land full of sunshine in south Yamashiro Province'.
The word "Joyo" means 'a rich land full of sunshine in south Yamashiro Province'.
The word "Joyo" means 'a rich land full of sunshine in south Yamashiro Province'.

sen.j: 1991年1月22日姉妹都市提携
sen.e: Joyo City established a sister-city relationship with Gyeongsan-si on January 22, 1991.
Joyo City established a sister-city relationship with Gyeongsan-si on January 22, 1991.
Joyo City established a sister-city relationship with Gyeongsan-si on January 22, 1991.

sen.j: バンクーバー (ワシントン州)（アメリカ合衆国ワシントン州）（カナダのバンクーバー (ブリティッシュコロンビア州)とは別）
sen.e: Vancouver (Washington, the United States of America), which is different from Vancouver, British Columbia, Canada.

sen.e: Joyo City established a sister-city relationship with Vancouver on October 30, 1995.

sen.j: 宇治市、八幡市、京田辺市、井手町、宇治田原町、久御山町
sen.e: Uji City, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Ide-cho, Ujitawara-cho, and Kumiyama-cho
Uji City, Yawata City, Kyotanabe City, Ide-cho, Ujitawara-cho, and Kumiyama-cho

sen.e: Joyo City does not have any adjacent prefectures.
Joyo City does not have any adjacent prefectures.

sen.j: 交通
sen.e: Transportation
Transportation
Transportation

sen.j: 主要交通機関はJR奈良線、近鉄京都線及び国道24号（大久保バイパス・京奈和自動車道）である。
sen.e: The main means of transportation is the JR Nara Line, the Kintetsu Kyoto Line, and the National Highway 24 (the Okubo Bypass and the Keinawa Expressway).
The main means of transportation is the JR Nara Line, the Kintetsu Kyoto Line, and the National Highway 24 (the Okubo Bypass and the Keinawa Expressway).
The main means of transportation is the JR Nara Line, the Kintetsu Kyoto Line, and the National Route 24 (the Okubo Bypass and the Keinawa Expressway).
sen.cmt: 国道→national route としました。

sen.j: 鉄道路線
sen.e: Railroad
Railroad
Railroad

sen.j: 中心となる駅は城陽駅（JR奈良線。快速停車駅）であり、同駅が市役所への最寄り駅である。
sen.e: Joyo Station, at which rapid trains stop, on the JR Nara Line is the main station and is the closest to the city hall.
The railroad centers around Joyo Station (JR Nara Line, Rapid Train Stop) and is the closest station to the city hall.
The railroad centers around Joyo Station (JR Nara Line, Rapid Train Stop) and is the closest station to the city hall.

sen.j: だが利用者数を見ると寺田駅 (京都府)（近鉄京都線）が一番多く、実質この駅が中心とも言える。
sen.e: Ranking first in the number of passengers, however, Terada Station on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line is the de facto central station of Joyo City.
However, looking at the number of passengers, Terada Station on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line can be said to be the working central station of Joyo City.
However, looking at the number of passengers, Terada Station (Kyoto Prefecture) on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line can be said to be the working central station of Joyo City.
sen.cmt: 京都府 を追加しました。

sen.j: 上記2つの駅のほか、JR奈良線の長池駅、山城青谷駅、近鉄京都線の久津川駅、富野荘駅がある。
sen.e: In addition to the two stations above, the city has the following four stations: Nagaike and Yamashiro-Aodani Stations on the JR Nara Line, and Kutsukawa and Tonosho Stations on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line.
In addition to the stations above, the city has the following four stations: Nagaike and Yamashiro-Aodani Stations on the JR Nara Line, and Kutsukawa and Tonosho Stations on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line.
In addition to the stations above, the city has the following four stations: Nagaike and Yamashiro-Aodani Stations on the JR Nara Line, and Kutsukawa and Tonosho Stations on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line.

sen.j: 北部は近鉄京都線の急行停車駅大久保駅 (京都府)、JR奈良線の新田駅 (京都府)が徒歩圏のため、両駅への利用者も多く、近鉄大久保駅へは市内全域からのバス路線が通じており、合わせて利用者が多い。
sen.e: Because Okubo Station, at which express trains stop, on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line and Shinden Station on the JR Nara Line are within walking distance in the northern part of Joyo City, many people in the city use those two stations; furthermore, Okubo Station has bus routes from the entire area of Joyo City and thus has even more passengers.

Since Okubo Station, an express train stop on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line and Shinden Station on the JR Nara Line are within walking distance in the northern part of Joyo City, many people use these two stations; furthermore, Okubo Station has bus routes running the entire area of Joyo City and has even more passengers.

Since Okubo Station, an express train stop on the Kintetsu Kyoto Line and Shinden Station (Kyoto Prefecture) on the JR Nara Line are within walking distance in the northern part of Joyo City, many people use these two stations; furthermore, Okubo Station has bus routes running the entire area of Joyo City and has even more passengers.
sen.cmt: 京都府 を追加しました。

sen.j: 近鉄線は、ラッシュ時及び日中を中心に、大久保、新田辺両駅での急行列車との緩急接続が比較的多く行われており、便利はよい。
sen.e: The Kintesu Line at both Okubo and Shin-tanabe Stations has a relatively large number of connections between local and express trains mainly during rush hour and daytime, which is making the railway line more accessible.

The Kintesu Line at both Okubo and Shin-tanabe Stations has a relatively large number of connections between local and express trains, mainly during rush hours and daytime, making the railway line more accessible.

The Kintesu Line at both Okubo and Shin-tanabe Stations has a relatively large number of connections between local and express trains, mainly during rush hours and daytime, making the railway line more accessible.

sen.j: また、大阪市への通勤では近鉄京都線に乗り、新田辺駅（京田辺市）から徒歩連絡するJR片町線（京田辺駅）の快速電車に乗り換えて大阪市へ向かう客も多い。
sen.e: Additionally, there are many commuters to Osaka City who take the Kintetsu Kyoto Line, and then connect on foot from Shin-tanabe Station to Kyotanabe Station to take a rapid train on the JR Katamachi Line to Osaka City.
Additionally, many commuters to Osaka City take the Kintetsu Kyoto Line, connecting on foot from Shin-tanabe Station to Kyotanabe Station to take a rapid train on the JR Katamachi Line to Osaka City.

Additionally, many commuters to Osaka City take the Kintetsu Kyoto Line, connecting on foot from Shin-tanabe Station (Kyotanabe City) to Kyotanabe Station to take a rapid train on the JR Katamachi Line to Osaka City.
sen.cmt: 京田辺市 追加しました。

sen.e: Fixed-route bus
Fixed-route bus
Fixed-route bus

sen.j: 市東部については城陽団地を中心に京阪宇治バスが運行されているが、西部に関しては路線網が薄い。
sen.e: In the eastern part of the city, Keihan Uji Bus Co., Ltd., operates, centering around the Joyo residential complex while, in the west, there are fewer routes.
Keihan Uji Bus Co., Ltd., operates in the eastern part of the city, centering around the Joyo residential complex while, in the west, there are fewer routes.
Keihan Uji Bus Co., Ltd., operates in the eastern part of the city, centering around the Joyo residential complex while, in the west, there are fewer routes.

sen.j: それを補完する形で、京阪宇治バスによる市循環バス（城陽さんさんバス）が3系統、各一時間に1～2本運行されている。
sen.e: To fill in gaps, the city circular bus, 'Joyo Sansan Bus' (城陽さんさんバス), is operated once or twice every hour in three routes by Keihan Uji Bus Co., Ltd.
To fill any gaps, Keihan Uji Bus Co., Ltd. operates the city circular bus, 'Joyo Sansan Bus' (城陽さんさんバス), once or twice every hour across three routes.
